summary: Open a modal to allow the user to select a special character.

params.name: characterSet
description: The name of the character set to present in the modal for the user to choose a special

summary: Open a modal to allow users to insert a special character from the specified special character set

params.name: characterSet
description: The name of the character set to present in the modal for the user to choose a special

special-character-insert.label: t__Symbol
special-character-insert.description: t__Insert a symbol that can not be easily inserted using your keyboard.

summary: Opens a modal to allow users to insert a special character from the default special character set
included in the platform at the current cursor position.

default-special-character-insert.label: t__Symbol
default-special-character-insert.description: t__Insert a symbol that can not be easily inserted using your keyboard.
